page.title: 06Budmouth Comprehensive.
page.content: {Budmouth School}is very big. The school has{four floors.}Each floor has about{16 rooms.}In the school there {are three halls.}They are{Welbridge, {Clare and Everdean halls.}The school has{two gym halls.}They are quite big. The{assembly room}was really big. At the front of this room is a big stage. Next to the assembly room is a place where we can eat our lunch. The{school uniform for girls}is a blue or white shirt with a navy skirt and jumper. The girls usually wear a tie which is dark blue with red and white stripes. {Each floor}in the school has a{letter. They are G for ground,F for first,S for second and T for third floors.On the{third floor}there is a{labartory which has stuffed animals in. On the{stair cases}there are{funny {pictures of people-}Layla Vicker
